entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI template issues for projects with tricky characters such as '&' (maui-blazor-web) #23105
    9.0-preview6
  • MAUI template issues for projects with tricky characters such as '&' #23104
  • [iOS]: Picker control's border doesn't respect forced light mode #23101
  • [iOS] NRE after calling ViewCell.ForceUpdateSize #23092
    .NET 8 SR6
  • BindingOperations Missing #23089
  • The color of hamburger icon in FlyoutPage always be changed to the white in Maui. #23087
  • Softkeyboard Return key of an Entry control shows Done when the property ReturnType is set to Next #23086
  • View with Dynamic Margin Size get blinking because resizing in Android #23085
  • Scrollview with ScrollView VerticalOptions="Center" not growing to fit contents on iOS #23084
  • IOS: PDF Readers are not shown in open in menu #23083
  • Enabling Essentials VersionTracking blocks main thread on Android #23082

PullRequests

Created

  • Add additional logging for PopLifeCycle #23103
  • [ci] Set OfficialBuildId when building asset manifests #23102
  • [SR6] Update arcade and xharness (#22981) #23100
  • Remove old Compatibility Appium test projects #23098
  • Fix loaded so it fires on second subscription #23095
  • [iOS] Fixed NRE after calling ViewCell.ForceUpdateSize #23094
    community ✨

Merged

  • Update vscode extension recommendations #23044
    area-infrastructure
  • Setup preview versioning for SR6.1 #23096
  • Make sure the main branch is using .NET 8 SDK #23077

Updated

  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui templates #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • [Windows] FilePicker picking multiple files is very slow because of `FutureAccessList` use #23047
    community ✨
  • [iOS] TapGestureRecognizer should not fire when view is not enabled #23049
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform, t/perf
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-dialogalert, stale
  • Fix animated gifs in Release builds #22874
    area-image
  • [net9.0] Move to 9.0.100.preview6 #23021
  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨, stale, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
